alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Jones; Monroe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 9:59AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bibb, southeastern Monroe, north central Crawford and central Jones Counties through 1030 AM EST ... At 959 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Forsyth to near Knoxville, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Forsyth, Gray, Payne, Payne City, Lake Tobesofkee, Bradley, Bolingbroke, Wayside, Dames Ferry, Round Oak, Clinton, Jarrell Plantation, Wesleyan, Lizella, Arkwright, Sandy Point, and Plant Scherer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EST for central Georgia.
